x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: Non-standard characters in the Client Secret on the Mobius API record prevent login from completing for AutoCAD extension (the login browser does not close after signing in)
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Client Secret on Mobius API record
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Update Client Secret to use only standard characters
x_nuvo_diag_probes.sys_name: Client Secret on Mobius API record

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_8e900daa1bf09110ae5b21b5ec4bcbb3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Non-standard characters in the Client Secret on the Mobius API record prevent login from completing for AutoCAD extension
(the login browser does not close after signing in)</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Client Secret on Mobius API record</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Update Client Secret to use only standard characters</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

//get the value from the Client Secret field on the Mobius API record
var gr = new GlideRecord('oauth_entity');
gr.get('name', 'MobiusAPI');

var clientSecret = gr.getValue('client_secret');

var test = "日本人";

//check if it contains non-standard characters
var hasMoreThanAscii = !/^[\u0000-\u007f]*$/.test(clientSecret);

//if it does, return message to update the Client Secret
if (hasMoreThanAscii== true) {
    util.handleOutput('There is a non standard character in the value of the Client Secret field o the MobiusAPI record. Update the field to contain only standard characters', 'Warning', 'Cad Extension');
}

]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jennifer.buck@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-22 21:49:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>8e900daa1bf09110ae5b21b5ec4bcbb3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Client Secret on Mobius API record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_8e900daa1bf09110ae5b21b5ec4bcbb3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:28</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
sys_update_version.record_name: Client Secret on Mobius API record

sys_audit_delete.display_value: Client Secret on Mobius API record

sys_metadata_delete.sys_name: Client Secret on Mobius API record
